00021 static int default_series_color[] = {
00022     V_BLUE,
00023     V_GREEN,
00024     V_RED,
00025     V_YELLOW,
00026     V_VIOLET,
00027     V_BROWN,
00028     V_ORANGE,
00029     V_PINK,
00030     V_BLACK,
00031     V_WHITE,
00032 };                                                // 10 default series colors

00065 //-------- Begin of function GraphA::init --------//
00099 void GraphA::init(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2, int seriesNum, int *dataNum,
00100                   void *dataArray, char dataTypeFlag,
00101                   int *xStart, int *xEnd, char *xLabel, char *yLabel,
00102                   char **legendArray, char transparentFlag,
00103                   char orientationFlag, char valueFlag,
00104                   int numFormat, int *seriesColor, int axisColor) {
00105     err_when(seriesNum > DEFAULT_SERIES_COLOR_NUM && !seriesColor);
00106     err_when(seriesNum <= 0);
00107     err_when(*xEnd < *xStart);
00108 
00109     graph_width = x2 - x1 - 6;
00110 
00111     err_when(graph_width < 0);
00112 
00113     grapha_x1 = x1;
00114     grapha_y1 = y1;
00115     grapha_x2 = x2;
00116     grapha_y2 = y2;
00117 
00118     series_num = seriesNum;
00119     data_num = dataNum;
00120     data_array = dataArray;
00121     data_type_flag = dataTypeFlag;
00122     x_start = xStart;
00123     x_end = xEnd;
00124 
00125     x_label = xLabel;
00126     y_label = yLabel;
00127     legend_array = legendArray;
00128 
00129     transparent_flag = transparentFlag;
00130     orientation_flag = orientationFlag;
00131     value_flag = valueFlag;
00132     num_format = num_format;
00133 
00134     series_color = seriesColor ? seriesColor : default_series_color;
00135     axis_color = axisColor;
00136 
00137     init_flag = 1;
00138 
00139     y_label_max_len = font_chartsm.text_width(MAX_LEN_LABEL);
00140     set_font(&font_chartsm);
00141 
00142     paint();
00143 }
00144

00147 //-------- Begin of function GraphA::deinit ------------//
00149 void GraphA::deinit() {
00150     if (grapha_bitmap) {
00151         mem_del(grapha_bitmap);
00152         grapha_bitmap = NULL;
00153     }
00154 
00155     init_flag = 0;
00156 }

00160 //-------- Begin of function GraphA::set_font ------------//
00162 void GraphA::set_font(Font *fontPtr) {
00163     if (!init_flag)
00164         return;
00165 
00166     font_ptr = fontPtr;
00167 
00168     calc_pos();
00169 }
00170 
00171 //------------- End of function GraphA::set_font ---------//

00173 //-------- Begin of function GraphA::calc_pos ------------//
00178 void GraphA::calc_pos() {
00179     if (legend_array) {
00180         short textWidth = 0, textHeight = font_ptr->max_font_height;
00181 
00182         for (int i = 0; i < series_num; i++) {
00183             if (font_ptr->text_width(legend_array[i]) > textWidth)
00184                 textWidth = font_ptr->text_width(legend_array[i]);
00185         }
00186 
00187         err_when(textWidth + LEGEND_X_SPACING * 2 > graph_width);
00188 
00189         legend_x_num = (graph_width - LEGEND_X_SPACING*2) / (textWidth + LEGEND_X_SPACING*2);
00190         legend_y_num = (series_num / legend_x_num) + ((series_num % legend_x_num) ? 1 : 0);
00191 
00192         graph_height = grapha_y2 - grapha_y1 - legend_y_num * (textHeight + LEGEND_Y_SPACING) - 6;
00193 
00194         err_when(graph_height <= 0);
00195 
00196         legend_width = (graph_width - LEGEND_X_SPACING*2) / legend_x_num;
00197         legend_height = textHeight + LEGEND_Y_SPACING;
00198     }
00199     else {
00200         legend_width = legend_height = legend_x_num = legend_y_num = 0;
00201         graph_height = grapha_y2 - grapha_y1 - 6;
00202     }
00203 
00204     short YLabelWidth = y_label ? (orientation_flag ? font_ptr->max_font_height : font_ptr->text_width(y_label)) : -COMMON_OFFSET;
00205     short XLabelHeight = x_label ? (font_ptr->max_font_height) : -COMMON_OFFSET;
00206     series_x1 = grapha_x1 + 4 + COMMON_OFFSET*4 + YLabelWidth + y_label_max_len;
00207     series_y1 = grapha_y1 + 4 + COMMON_OFFSET*6;
00208     series_x2 = grapha_x2 - 4 - COMMON_OFFSET*12;
00209     series_y2 = grapha_y1 + graph_height - COMMON_OFFSET*3 - (font_ptr->max_font_height) - XLabelHeight;
00210 }
00211 
00212 //------------ End of function GraphA::calc_pos ---------//

00214 //-------- Begin of function GraphA::paint --------------//
00216 void GraphA::paint() {
00217     if (transparent_flag) {
00218         user_interface.brighten(grapha_x1+4, grapha_y1+4, grapha_x2-2, grapha_y2-2);
00219 
00220         //              vga.use_back();
00221         if (legend_array)
00222             draw_legend();
00223         draw_axis_label();
00224         //              vga.use_front();
00225 
00226         grapha_bitmap = vga_back.save_area(grapha_x1+4, grapha_y1+4, grapha_x2-2, grapha_y2-2, grapha_bitmap);
00227     }
00228 
00229     paint_flag = 1;
00230     refresh();
00231 }
00232 
00233 //------------- End of function GraphA::paint -----------//
00234 
00235 //-------- Begin of function GraphA::refresh ------------//
00237 void GraphA::refresh() {
00238     //  vga.use_back();
00239 
00240     if (transparent_flag) {
00241         user_interface.rect(grapha_x1, grapha_y1, grapha_x2, grapha_y2, 2);
00242         vga_back.rest_area(grapha_bitmap, 0, 0);
00243     }
00244     else {
00245         user_interface.bar(grapha_x1, grapha_y1, grapha_x2, grapha_y2);
00246         user_interface.panel(grapha_x1+3, grapha_y1+3, grapha_x2-4, grapha_y2-4);
00247         if (legend_array)
00248             draw_legend();
00249     }
00250     draw_scale();
00251     draw_series();
00252 
00253     //  vga.use_front();
00254     if (!paint_flag)
00255         vga.blt_buf(grapha_x1, grapha_y1, grapha_x2+2, grapha_y2+2);
00256     else
00257         paint_flag = 0;
00258 }
00259

00262 //---------- Begin of function GraphA::draw_legend ------------//
00264 void GraphA::draw_legend() {
00265     for (int i = 0; i < series_num; i++) {
00266         short legendX = grapha_x1 + 4 + (i % legend_x_num) * legend_width + LEGEND_X_SPACING;
00267         short legendY = grapha_y1 + 4 + graph_height + (i / legend_x_num) * legend_height;
00268         user_interface.bar( legendX+LEGEND_X_SPACING, legendY+LEGEND_Y_SPACING,
00269                             legendX+LEGEND_X_SPACING+LEGEND_SIZE, legendY+LEGEND_Y_SPACING+LEGEND_SIZE,
00270                             series_color[i] );
00271         font_ptr->put( legendX+LEGEND_X_SPACING*2+LEGEND_SIZE, legendY+LEGEND_Y_SPACING, legend_array[i] );
00272     }
00273 }
00274

00277 //---------- Begin of function GraphA::draw_axis_label --------//
00279 void GraphA::draw_axis_label() {
00280     short textHeight = font_ptr->max_font_height;
00281 
00282     if (x_label) {
00283         font_ptr->center_put( series_x1, series_y2+COMMON_OFFSET*2+textHeight,
00284                               series_x2, grapha_y1+graph_height-COMMON_OFFSET, x_label );
00285     }
00286 
00287     if (y_label) {
00288         short textWidth = font_ptr->text_width(y_label) + 1;
00289 
00290         if (orientation_flag) {
00291             short *fontBuf = (short *) sys.common_data_buf;
00292             err_when(textWidth * textHeight * sizeof(short) > COMMON_DATA_BUF_SIZE);
00293 
00294             for (int i = 0; i < textWidth * textHeight; i++)
00295                 *fontBuf++ = transparent_code_w;
00296 
00297             font_ptr->put_to_bufferW(fontBuf = (short *) sys.common_data_buf, textWidth * sizeof(short), 0, 0, y_label);
00298 
00299             short xStart = grapha_x1 + 4 + COMMON_OFFSET * 2;
00300             short yStart = (series_y1 + series_y2 - textWidth) / 2;
00301 
00302             for (short x = 0; x < textHeight; x++) {
00303                 for (short y = textWidth - 1; y >= 0; y--, fontBuf++) {
00304                     if (*fontBuf != transparent_code_w)
00305                         *vga_back.buf_ptr(xStart+x, yStart+y) = *fontBuf;
00306                 }
00307             }
00308         }
00309         else {
00310             font_ptr->center_put( grapha_x1+4+COMMON_OFFSET*2, series_y1,
00311                                   grapha_x1+4+COMMON_OFFSET*2+textWidth, series_y2, y_label);
00312         }
00313     }
00314 }
00315 
00316 //------------ End of function GraphA::draw_axis_label --------//

00318 //---------- Begin of function GraphA::find_scale -------------//
00320 void GraphA::find_scale() {
00321     double data, maxVal = 0.0;
00322     x_axis_pos = 0;
00323 
00324     for (int i = 0; i < series_num * *data_num; i++) {
00325         switch (data_type_flag) {
00326         case DATA_DOUBLE:
00327             data = ((double*)data_array)[i];
00328             break;
00329         case DATA_FLOAT:
00330             data = double(((float*)data_array)[i]);
00331             break;
00332         case DATA_INT:
00333             data = double(((int*)data_array)[i]);
00334             break;
00335         case DATA_LONG:
00336             data = double(((long*)data_array)[i]);
00337             break;
00338         }
00339         if (fabs(data) > maxVal)
00340             maxVal = fabs(data);
00341         if (!x_axis_pos && data < 0.0)
00342             x_axis_pos = 1;
00343     }
00344     if (maxVal>0)
00345         max_scale = pow(10,ceil(log10(maxVal)));
00346     else
00347         max_scale = 5;
00348 }
00349 
00350 //------------ End of function GraphA::find_scale -------------//
00351 
00352 //---------- Begin of function GraphA::draw_scale -------------//
00354 void GraphA::draw_scale() {
00355     find_scale();
00356 
00357     short xAxisPos;
00358 
00359     //------ Draw y-axis -------//
00360 
00361     if (x_axis_pos)
00362         vga_back.bar(series_x1, series_y1-COMMON_OFFSET*2, series_x1+1, series_y2+COMMON_OFFSET*2, axis_color);
00363     else
00364         vga_back.bar(series_x1, series_y1-COMMON_OFFSET*2, series_x1+1, series_y2, axis_color);
00365 
00366     short scaleNum = (series_y2-series_y1-font_ptr->max_font_height) / (font_ptr->max_font_height*3/2);
00367     if ( scaleNum > 0 )
00368         scaleNum = short(pow(2,floor(log10(double(scaleNum))/log10(2.0))));
00369     else
00370         scaleNum = 0;
00371     short scaleStep = (series_y2-series_y1) / scaleNum;
00372     double scaleValue;
00373     for (int i = 0; i <= scaleNum; i++) {
00374         if ( (x_axis_pos && i == scaleNum / 2) || !(x_axis_pos || i) )
00375             vga_back.bar(series_x1, xAxisPos=series_y2-i*scaleStep-1, series_x2+COMMON_OFFSET*8, series_y2-i*scaleStep, axis_color);
00376         else
00377             vga_back.bar(series_x1, series_y2-i*scaleStep, series_x1+COMMON_OFFSET*2, series_y2-i*scaleStep, axis_color);
00378 
00379         if (x_axis_pos)
00380             scaleValue = max_scale*2/scaleNum*i - max_scale;
00381         else
00382             scaleValue = max_scale/scaleNum*i;
00383 
00384         switch (data_type_flag) {
00385         case DATA_FLOAT:
00386         case DATA_DOUBLE:
00387             font_ptr->right_put(series_x1-COMMON_OFFSET, series_y2-i*scaleStep-font_ptr->max_font_height/2, m.format(scaleValue,num_format));
00388             break;
00389         case DATA_INT:
00390         case DATA_LONG:
00391             font_ptr->right_put(series_x1-COMMON_OFFSET, series_y2-i*scaleStep-font_ptr->max_font_height/2, m.format(long(scaleValue),num_format));
00392         }
00393     }
00394 
00395     //------ Draw x-axis -------//
00396 
00397     short maxLabelWidth = font_ptr->text_width(m.format(*x_end, 4))+COMMON_OFFSET*2;
00398     x_axis_step = (series_x2-series_x1) / (*data_num-1);
00399     short displayInc = 1;
00400     while (displayInc * x_axis_step / maxLabelWidth < 1) displayInc++;
00401     int xAxisStep = (*x_end - *x_start) / (*data_num - 1);
00402     for (i = 0; i < *data_num-1; i += displayInc) {
00403         vga_back.bar(series_x2-i*x_axis_step, xAxisPos-COMMON_OFFSET*2, series_x2-i*x_axis_step, xAxisPos, axis_color);
00404         font_ptr->center_put((series_x2-i*x_axis_step)-maxLabelWidth/2-COMMON_OFFSET, xAxisPos+COMMON_OFFSET,
00405                              (series_x2-i*x_axis_step)+maxLabelWidth/2+COMMON_OFFSET, xAxisPos+COMMON_OFFSET+font_ptr->max_font_height, m.format(*x_end-xAxisStep*i, 4));
00406     }
00407 }
00408 
00409 //------------ End of function GraphA::draw_scale -------------//

00411 //---------- Begin of function GraphA::draw_series ------------//
00413 void GraphA::draw_series() {
00414     switch (data_type_flag) {
00415     case DATA_FLOAT: draw_series_float(); break;
00416     case DATA_DOUBLE: draw_series_double(); break;
00417     case DATA_INT: draw_series_int(); break;
00418     case DATA_LONG: draw_series_long(); break;
00419     }
00420 }
00421 
00422 //------------ End of function GraphA::draw_series ------------//
00423 
00424 //---------- Begin of function GraphA::draw_series_float ------------//
00426 void GraphA::draw_series_float() {
00427     float *dataArray = (float *) data_array;
00428     short prevX, prevY, currX, currY;
00429 
00430     for (int i = 0; i < series_num; i++) {
00431         prevX = series_x1;
00432         if (x_axis_pos)
00433             prevY = series_y2 - short(((*dataArray+float(max_scale)) * float(series_y2-series_y1) / float(max_scale*2)));
00434         else
00435             prevY = series_y2 - short(*dataArray * float(series_y2-series_y1) / float(max_scale));
00436 
00437         dataArray++;
00438 
00439         for (int j = 1; j < *data_num; j++) {
00440             currX = series_x1 + j * x_axis_step;
00441             if (x_axis_pos)
00442                 currY = series_y2 - short(((*dataArray+float(max_scale)) * float(series_y2-series_y1) / float(max_scale*2)));
00443             else
00444                 currY = series_y2 - short(*dataArray * float(series_y2-series_y1) / float(max_scale));
00445 
00446             vga_back.thick_line(prevX, prevY, currX, currY, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]));
00447 
00448             prevX = currX;
00449             prevY = currY;
00450             dataArray++;
00451         }
00452 
00453         if (value_flag)
00454             draw_value(dataArray-1, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]), prevX+COMMON_OFFSET, prevY-font_ptr->max_font_height/2, DATA_FLOAT);
00455     }
00456 }
00457 
00458 //------------ End of function GraphA::draw_series_float ------------//
00459

00470         else

00496 //---------- Begin of function GraphA::draw_series_int ------------//
00498 void GraphA::draw_series_int() {

00568 //---------- Begin of function GraphA::draw_value -------------------//
00570 void GraphA::draw_value(void *value, int color, short x, short y, int dataType) {
00571     char *valueString;
00572     switch (data_type_flag) {
00573     case DATA_FLOAT:
00574         valueString = m.format(*((float *) value), num_format); break;
00575     case DATA_DOUBLE:
00576         valueString = m.format(*((double *) value), num_format); break;
00577     case DATA_INT:
00578         valueString = m.format(*((int *) value), num_format); break;
00579     case DATA_LONG:
00580         valueString = m.format(*((long *) value), num_format); break;
00581     }
00582 
00583     short textHeight = font_ptr->max_font_height;
00584     short textWidth = font_ptr->text_width(valueString) + 1;
00585 
00586     short *bitmap = (short *) sys.common_data_buf;
00587     err_when( (2 + textWidth * textHeight) * sizeof(short) > COMMON_DATA_BUF_SIZE );
00588     *bitmap++ = textWidth;
00589     *bitmap++ = textHeight;
00590 
00591     short *shortPtr = bitmap;
00592     for (int i = 0; i < textWidth * textHeight; i++)
00593         *shortPtr++ = transparent_code_w;
00594 
00595     font_ptr->put_to_bufferW(bitmap, textWidth * sizeof(short), 0, 0, valueString);
00596 
00597     shortPtr = bitmap;
00598     for (i = 0; i < textWidth * textHeight; i++, shortPtr++)
00599         if (*shortPtr != transparent_code_w)
00600             *shortPtr = color;
00601 
00602     vga_back.put_bitmapW_trans(x, y, (short *) sys.common_data_buf);
00603 }
